name: apps.auth.external.get
desc: Get the access token for the provided token ID

external_token_id.desc: The id of the token you want to get the token for.

force_refresh.desc: Always refresh existing token before returning even when the token has not expired.

errors.token_not_found: No token found for the passed external_token_id
errors.method_not_supported: This API method is not supported
errors.no_refresh_token: No refresh token found for the passed external_token_id
errors.access_token_exchange_failed: There was an error while attempting to exchange or refresh token
